hadiths.text: Uqbah bin Amir narrated that The Messenger of Allah said:“Beware of entering upon women.” So a man from the Ansar said: ‘”O Messenger of Allah! What do you think about Hamu? So he said: “The Hamu is death.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الدُّخُولِ عَلَى الْمُغِيبَاتِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about it being disliked to enter upon women whose husbands are absent
